subject: Basketball
Computers and the Internet
Statistics
Officiating (Sports)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: As the Lakers and the Magic tested one another in the finals, the N.B.A. was testing a new tracking system, one that could perhaps alter how the game is watched, measured and coached.
snippet: As the Lakers and the Magic tested one another in the finals, the N.B.A. was testing a new tracking system, one that could perhaps alter how the game is watched, measured and coached.
